Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.cardinality

Class CardinalityEstimatorManager

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.cardinality.CardinalityEstimatorManager
public class CardinalityEstimatorManager extends Object
Handles the CardinalityEstimates of a WayangPlan.

  • Method Details

    • pushCardinalities

      public boolean pushCardinalities()
      Traverse the WayangPlan, thereby updating CardinalityEstimates.
      Returns:
      whether any CardinalityEstimates have been updated

    • pushCardinalities

      public boolean pushCardinalities(PlanImplementation planImplementation)
      Traverse the WayangPlan, thereby updating CardinalityEstimates. Also update conversion Operator cardinalities as provided by the PlanImplementation.
      Parameters:
      planImplementation - that has conversion Operators
      Returns:
      whether any CardinalityEstimates have been updated

    • updateConversionOperatorCardinalities

      public void updateConversionOperatorCardinalities(PlanImplementation planImplementation, OptimizationContext optimizationContext, int optimizationContextIndex)
      Update conversion Operator cardinalities.
      Parameters:
      planImplementation - that has conversion Operators
      optimizationContext - that provides optimization information for the planImplementation
      optimizationContextIndex - the index of the optimizationContext (important inside of loops)

    • getPlanTraversal

      public CardinalityEstimationTraversal getPlanTraversal()

    • pushCardinalityUpdates

      public boolean pushCardinalityUpdates(ExecutionState executionState, PlanImplementation planImplementation)
      Injects the cardinalities of a current ExecutionState into its associated WayangPlan (or its OptimizationContext, respectively) and then reperforms the cardinality estimation.
      Returns:
      whether any cardinalities have been injected
